entry.title: 3M EA02DC-6C - Filtrete Healthy Living Elite Allergen Filter, Mpr 2200, 20 in x 20 in x 1 in 7100016707
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 30.49

[shortdesc]

Filtrete Healthy Living Elite Allergen Filter, MPR 2200, 20 in x 20 in x 1 in

  • A healthy home begins with cleaner air
  • Improve the air quality in your house by reducing the amount of airborne allergens with a Filtrete™ Healthy Living Elite Allergen Filter
  • Using electrostatic technology, this high-performance filter proactively captures dust, bacteria, germs, viruses and allergens from the air, and is five times better than non-electrostatic filters at capturing small particles
  • For maximum performance, replace your Filtrete™ Filter seasonally (every 90 days) to ensure you and your household are breathing cleaner air.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Mexico

    Product Information

  • Attracts and captures large and microscopic airborne allergens
  • Carries a 2200 Microparticle Performance Rating (MPR)
  • Five times better than non-electrostatic filters at capturing small particles
  • Lasts up to three months
  • Noticeably fresher air
  • For residential use only
  • Bacteria and Viruses: 8
    		•

entry.title: JET H3529 - 14 Piece Deluxe Serpentine Belt Tool Kit H3529
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Serpentine Belt Tool
Price: 165.84

[shortdesc]

14 PC Deluxe Serpentine Belt Tool Kit

  • Enables rapid and easy removal and installation of belts on serpentine belt equipped vehicles
  • Connect the tool to the spring loaded idler pulley to release the tension
  • Fits most vehicles
  • Comes in convenient blow mold storage case
  • Kit includes:
  • Serpentine belt tool with cushion grip
  • Extension bars: 6" and 10" – for versatility and leverage
  • Sockets: 13, 14, 15, 16, 18mm – with custom 16mm drive end to fit bars
  • 3/8" & 1/2" Drive Adapters – with custom 16mm drive end to fit bar
  • 3/8" Drive Crowfoot Wrenches 13, 14, 15mm – use with 3/8" adaptor above
  • 3/8" - 16 UNC Bolt – to attach extension bars to long handle
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Product Type Serpentine Belt Tool
    Size 3/16 Inch

entry.title: 3M Filtrete 9801DC-6-C - Filtrete Allergen Defense Micro Allergen Filter 9801Disc-6 Mpr 1000 16x25x1 7100038678
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Filters
Price: 16.91

[shortdesc]

Filtrete Allergen Defense Micro Allergen Filter, MPR 1000, 16 in x 25 in x 1 in

  • A healthy home begins with cleaner air
  • Improve the air quality in your house by reducing the amount of airborne allergens with a Filtrete™ Allergen Defense Micro Allergen Filter
  • Using electrostatic technology, this high-performance filter turns your central heating and cooling system into a whole-house air cleaner by attracting and capturing microscopic allergens like pet dander, smoke and household dust, while also taking care of larger airborne allergens such as mould spores and pollen
  • For maximum performance, replace your Filtrete™ Filter seasonally (every 90 days) to ensure you and your household are breathing cleaner air.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Filtrete
    Origin Country Mexico
    Product Type Filters

    Product Information

  • Attracts and captures microscopic allergens like pet dander, smoke, household dust, and large allergens like pollen and mold spores
  • Carries a 1000 Microparticle Performance Rating (MPR)
  • Lasts up to three months
  • Outperforms fibreglass, washable, and non-electrostatic pleated 1-inch (2.5 cm) filters
  • Noticeably fresher air
  • For residential use only

    • Suggested Application

  • Capture and reduce the amount of airborne allergens and viruses in your home
  • Use with Filtrete™ Whole House Air Fresheners to keep your home smelling just the way you like
  • Replace your filter seasonally for best performance (every 90 days)
    		•
